name: idleBeer
description:
Welcome to idleBeer, a clicking game about Beers!

Upgrade your Bartender clicking on the giant beautiful looking beer at the table!
Unlock Skills and use them to boost your gameplay!
Unlock and buy tons of Beers* to earn more per sec!
Offline Earnings, everything will be stored when you go to sleep!
Steam Trading Cards
Have fun!
*idleBeer saves automatically

Take a look below at the Skills Descriptions, you need to upgrade your Bartender in order to unlock the skills and upgrades.
Skills Description:

INSTANT BEER: Bartender lvl 10 - 500 Beers - 3min
Upgarde 1 - Bartender lvl 25 - 1500 Beers - Cooldown 2min
Upgrade 2 - Bartender lvl 50 - 25000 Beers - Cooldown 1.30min
Upgrade 3 - Bartender lvl 75 - 100000 Beers - Cooldown 1min

MORE BEER CLICK: Bartender lvl 25 - +30 Beers/Click/10sec - 2min
Upgarde 1 - Bartender lvl 50 - +60 Beers/Click/10sec - Cooldown 1.30min
Upgrade 2 - Bartender lvl 75 - +120 Beers/Click/15sec - Cooldown 1.30min
Upgrade 3 - Bartender lvl 100 - +300 Beers/Click/15sec - Cooldown 1min

CAPS ALL AROUND: Bartender lvl 35 - +3 Caps - 2min
Upgarde 1 - Bartender lvl 50 - +6 Caps - Cooldown 2min
Upgrade 2 - Bartender lvl 70 - +12 Caps - Cooldown 1.30min
Upgrade 3 - Bartender lvl 110 - +25 Caps - Cooldown 1min

It is a simple and beautiful clicker game for you to enjoy!

* All the Beers in this game exists in real life.
